data.text: Stayed at the Best Western Konak overnight before heading to Ephesus.  Had a great stay and would have planned to stay another night if I had known that the location was great and close to the Bazaar.  Ocean view was great also
data.title: Good location, great views and close to Bazaar

data.text:
I've reserved a room with 2 separate beds. When I've arrived, I've mentioned my request during checking in. I've had to go up and down twice with my luggage's and my elderly sister to find double beds in both rooms. Our third trip upstairs... another staff member had to up with with us and look for a room with 2 single beds. 
I've requested a room with a view, and I've received a room with no view.
During check out, she asked if I used any refreshments from their refrigerator. We've had 2 bottles of water. She asked for 15 lira...... I've stayed at many hotels in the past and never asked to pay for water. 
2 night's stay was 5000 lira.....  for this hotel to ask for 15 lira for water was unbelievable.
data.title: VERY BAD EXPERIENCE!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for valued feedback regarding your recent stay at our property. 
On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologise for not exceeding your expectations. 
Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. 
I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.
 In case of any assistance may ı do , please don't hesitate to contact me directly at +902324891500. 
Yours Sincerely, 
MURAT CAN SAKARYA 
Hotel Manager 
Best Western Plus Hotel Konak
owner_response.author: MURAT SAKARYA

data.text: We have stay this hotel with my wife for rest and relax our brain . Because i really like this hotel room view and also i stayed special room which have yakuzi .. all perfect and we really enjoy to stay here . I have a home at İzmir and no need to stay but i take photo of this hotel last year and always want to stay this room and  i made it .. location and all is perfect about this hotel and i am sure you will also like
data.title: I made it .. best view in town ...

data.text: It was fantastic , amazing view, very nice room and services, perfect breakfast, 10m walking to the center , 4m with a taxi. Amazing stuff make me feel safe, suitable for family and children, air conditioning working good, and the internet great, they have smart tv , you can cast your device to screen.... Many good things...
data.title: My experience with best western plus hotel konak

data.text:
It was amazing, very comfortable and friendly

linen is changed on time, the food is delicious, the staff is understanding, the interior is pleasant, the infrastructure is excellent

the view from the window is amazing, the organization of group meetings is excellent, the view from the window is very cool
data.title: Very ok
